content: Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong can't be upgraded, so you can't increase their strength. Therefore, if you want to increase their power or find a better item for your build, you will need to search them out and switch your Curios item from the Equipment menu.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cat_Eye_Beads.md', within the main section titled 'Cat Eye Beads'.
The content is as follows:
Curios items in Black Myth: Wukong can't be upgraded, so you can't increase their strength. Therefore, if you want to increase their power or find a better item for your build, you will need to search them out and switch your Curios item from the Equipment menu.
